author: benedettauk
title: Value for money AND I MEAN IT
text:
Booked the hotel with some discount and paid in advance.
I go to London very often and I like to try different hotels in different part of the city.
I was a bit concerned about the reviews, rooms far too small and so on.
Reluctantly I booked a single room.
Get there, lovely location, south kens and Gloucester Road tube stations right there for you.
Nice entrance with plenty of staff available.
I was greeted by a very nice concierge who gave me a complimentary double room.
Calls the lif for me and gives me essential information.
Room was small but not too small with everything you need.
Bed is comfortable with crispy linen.
Kettle and water and plenty of towels.
A virtual concierge sent a text and I even booked the taxi by texting back.
Concierge opens the door of the taxi which I felt was a luxurious touch.
Breakfast is great, with fresh food, fruit and very good quality.
Overall, great experience and great service for a very affordable price for central London.
